title: STUNNING FURNISHED IN ICON BAY!!
posting_body: ['Stunning fully furnished 3 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath corner Unit At Icon Bay with spectacular City and Bay views.', 'For Rent for 6 months.', 'Available July 17th.', 'Decorated with top of the line furniture, floor to ceiling windows, roller blinds/blackouts in bedrooms, custom walk-in closets and private elevator.', 'Possibility to convert nursery room into an office room or queen bed room.', 'The building offers resort style amenities including infinity pool, 2 Tennis Courts, Gym, Spa, Party Room and a sky lobby with an entertainment area including a movie and a pool table.', 'Edgewater is a very central neighborhoood just 5 to 10 minutes drive to Miami Design District, Midtown Shops, Wynwood, Brickell and Miami Beach.', 'all units are one year lease min!', 'credit score close to 700 or higher required, proof of income 2,5 greater than rent price, first month + last month + security deposit to move in!', 'Dilya Taveras', 'Equity Realty', 'TEXT :', 'show contact info']
